Title: Allows for certain disability benefits to continue in the event an individual who is receiving such benefits gets married
Summary: Allows for certain disability benefits to continue in the event an individual who is receiving such benefits gets married; provides that the marriage to another individual which would otherwise make an individual ineligible for certain disability benefits shall not be considered if such individual is already receiving disability benefits at the time of becoming married and continues to meet certain criteria.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing for certain disability benefits to continue in the event an individual who is receiving such benefits gets married
